summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of VirtualHEMS Downloads page - all core functionality working correctly
passed_tests: Downloads page loads correctly at /downloads route
X-Plane plugin download link (/downloads/HEMS_XPlane_Plugin_v2.zip) works and file is accessible (2,685 bytes)
MSFS plugin download link (/downloads/HEMS_MSFS_Plugin_v1.zip) works and file is accessible (7,363 bytes)
Tab switching between X-Plane and MSFS works bidirectionally
X-Plane plugin content displays correctly by default
MSFS plugin content displays correctly after tab switch
Sidebar shows 'Downloads & Plugins' link correctly when on downloads page
Downloads & Plugins link is highlighted as active when on downloads page
Login page loads correctly with email and password fields
Account creation functionality works - 'Register for duty' switches to registration form
Registration form displays with First Name, Last Name, Email, and Password fields
Form validation is present (password requirements shown)
Professional UI styling and branding consistent across all pages
Download files are properly served from /public/downloads/ directory
